text: Lyutvi Ahmed Mestan (), or shortly Lyutvi Mestan (born 24 December 1960), is a Bulgarian politician. He is of Turkish-Bulgarian origin. He was the 2nd chairman of the Movement for Rights and Freedoms. He has been the Member of Parliament for Kardzhali. == References == == Other websites == * Bulgarian Parliament Category:1960 births Category:Living people Category:Bulgarian politicians
title: Lyutvi Mestan
